titleStmt.title: A poem humbly dedicated to the great patern [sic] of piety and virtue Catherine, Queen Dowager on the death of her dear lord and husband, King Charles II / by Mrs. Behn.
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
